New Face ğŸ‰

  1. Rewrite content search components, support search in editing and preview mode, and the experience is much better than before.
  2. TOC supports pin control, which is convenient for friends who need to open it frequently.
  3. The picture preview of the editor page is changed to command + hover to prevent the original direct display interference.
  4. Fix the problem that double scroll bars may occur in some models in preview mode.

  8. æ€§èƒ½å’Œä½“éªŒæ”¹è¿› - å¤§å¹…æå‡å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€Ÿåº¦ï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–å¯¼å‡ºåŠŸèƒ½è§£å†³è¶…æ—¶é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç¦ç”¨å¼¹æ€§æ»šåŠ¨ä½¿æ“ä½œæ›´ç²¾å‡†
  9. ä»£ç æ¶æ„é‡æ„ - DownView é¢„è§ˆç»„ä»¶å’Œä¾§è¾¹æ é€»è¾‘é‡æ„ï¼Œæ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶æ¨¡å—åŒ–ä¾¿äºç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œç”šè‡³æ”¯æŒ VSCode å¼€å‘äº†

New DiscoveriesğŸ¥œ

  1. 2.1.6 Support icons of various modes under Mac26, fix Markmap rendering truncation, fix the bottom cache blocking editing problem
  2. Improve the theme switching function - support adaptive system themes, fix list selection behavior, and improve the accuracy of file type detection.
  3. Enhanced Navigation & Image Support â€“ Added automatic TOC (Table of Contents) generation for article navigation, PicList image-hosting uploads, and support for referencing local images from any location.
  4. Improved Editing Efficiency â€“ Quick template insertion via the Tab key, automatic file change detection and refresh, and optimized bottom spacing in the editor.
  5. Upgraded PPT Presentation Mode â€“ More customizable configuration parameters, substantially refined styles, and a more professional presentation experience.
  6. Major Preview Rendering Upgrade â€“ Overall improvements to preview visuals and interactions; optimized styles for Mermaid, Markmap, and PlantUML; and better code block and inline code display.
  7. Key Bug Fixes â€“ Fixed preview styles failing after long sessions, resolved potential editor crashes, and corrected abnormal expand/collapse logic in the notes list.
  8. Performance & UX Improvements â€“ Significantly faster content search, optimized export to avoid timeouts, and disabled elastic scrolling for more precise operations.
  9. Code Architecture Refactor â€“ Rebuilt the DownView preview component and sidebar logic, modularized style files for easier maintenance, and even enabled development in VS Code.
